bug.author: sumanthratna
bug.summary: [tune] [documentation] Installation instructions for dragonfly are incorrect
bug.description: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dragonfly/dragonfly/blob/master/docs/install.md>https://github.com/dragonfly/dragonfly/blob/master/docs/install.md</denchmark-link> says dragonfly should be installed via . <denchmark-link:https://ray.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tune-searchalg.html#dragonfly-search>https://ray.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tune-searchalg.html#dragonfly-search</denchmark-link> says dragonfly should be installed via . Further, errors due to a syntax error in a file imported in .

comments.comment: Thanks for the catch, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/sumanthratna>@sumanthratna</denchmark-link> -- would you be open to pushing a small fix?
